name: Friday Night Funkin' Ugh
description:
Ugh Mod, this is just a mod not the real thing(@ninja_muffin99:for original game)(Kawai_Sprite:for music)(Shmish21:for pretty much all the coding on this mod)(thats just awesome:for uploading the mod)

CONTROLS: (WASD) or (ARROW_KEYS) to play (P) is to enter practice mode(It hits all the notes you miss for you) press (P) again to exit practice mode.

UPDATES: 

2.0 Update:Changes to gameplay and fixes to bugs
